meanings.sent1: After work, he winoes with his friends at the bar.
meanings.sent2: She winoes every weekend until she feels sick.
meanings.sent3: The party was wild, with everyone winoing and dancing.
meanings.sent4: His troubles led him to winoes as a way to escape reality.
meanings.sent5: The winoing at the party was so loud, it could be heard from the street.

meanings.definition: Winoes (noun): individuals who drink alcohol excessively
meanings.sent1: The winoes gathered at the park for their daily drinking session.
meanings.sent2: She felt sorry for the winoes on the street corner, struggling with addiction.
meanings.sent3: The winoes at the party were the life of the event, telling stories and laughing.
meanings.sent4: In the city, you can often see winoes sitting on benches with bottles in hand.
meanings.sent5: The winoes formed a close-knit community, supporting each other through tough times.
